item.description: Hiker Rescue - Hoist Operation; INC#0405; 08:47AM; 2699 N Westridge Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vywaYm; Brentwood; LAFD Air Ops is conducting a hoist operation to retrieve and transport an adult male mountain biker with a non-life threatening injury. The 9-1-1 call was received at 8:21AM. No further details.; FS 19; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC9 E269 E69 H1 H3 HA1 HA3 RA69 RH114 T69; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1436; 08:26PM; 730 S Manhattan Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OrdVNa; Koreatown; KNOCKDOWN: 73 firefighters extinguished the fire in just 23 minutes. Crews held the blaze and prevented it from extending to the exposed building. No injuries reported. The cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 4; BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM22 E10 E13 E211 E226 E227 E229 E26 E261 E27 E29 E52 EM1 EM11 EM14 HR3 RA26 RA29 RA52 RA826 SQ21 T11 T26 T27 T29 T61 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#1436; 08:03PM; 698 S Western Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OrDRIb; Koreatown; The 2nd story is fully involved in fire. This is now a defensive operation. They are conducting a transitional attack (from the exterior) to knock back the bulk of the fire before continuing the attack. Firefighters are working to defend the exposed building to the South from damage. No injuries reported. ; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM22 E10 E13 E211 E226 E227 E229 E26 E261 E27 E29 E52 EM1 EM11 EM14 HR3 RA26 RA29 RA52 RA826 T11 T26 T27 T29 T61 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1436; 08:03PM; 698 S Western Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OrDRIb; Koreatown; Two story, vacant fourplex with heavy smoke showing from the second floor and possible exposures to the south. Two additional task forces requested (not reflected in this alert). Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC5 E13 E226 E229 E26 E29 RA29 RA826 T26 T29; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1030; 03:45PM; 2880 W Francis Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/38bxZ5u; Westlake; KNOCKDOWN: 27 firefighters achieved a knockdown in 13 minutes. One approx 45yo F is being evaluated by firefighter/paramedics (no condition available at this time). The fire was contained to the unit of origin. The cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 13; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 BC18 E13 E211 E215 E229 E26 E6 RA26 SQ21 T11 T15 T29; CH7; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1030; 03:32PM; 2880 W Francis Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/38bxZ5u; Westlake; Two story, garden style apartment building with heavy smoke from one unit on the second floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 13; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 BC18 E13 E211 E215 E229 E26 E6 SQ21 T11 T15 T29; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Update Plane Down - FATALITY; INC#0722; 01:14PM; Wb 210 Fy x Hubbard St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3B9e1Sv; Sylmar; After a thorough search of all void spaces in the aircraft, firefighters did not locate any other victims. One person determined dead in the aircraft (age/gender unknown at this time). The small fuel leak was quickly contained by the first arriving fire companies. There was no fire resulting from the crash. The NTSB is responding and will be the agency for any questions regarding the aircraft and the circumstances leading to the crash. LAFD PIO Firefighter Shawn Lenske is responding for media availability (fire related involvement only). LAFD is in Unified Command with law enforcement.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E18 E275 E298 E75 E87 E98 EM15 FR91 HR3 PI4 RA75 RA91 RA98 T75 T98 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update Plane Down; INC#0722; 12:38PM; Wb 210 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3B9e1Sv; Sylmar; Firefighters have confirmed one person deceased and are searching to determine if there are any other aircraft occupants. There is a small fuel leak being contained and no fire issue. Traffic on the WB210 will be impacted and drivers are advised to avoid the area. Follow CHP Log# 1315. Sayre St north of 210 will also be impacted and likely closed. Any questions regarding aircraft specifics, cause, origin, etc are referred to the appropriate agencies.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E18 E275 E298 E75 E87 E98 EM15 FR91 HR3 RA75 RA98 T75 T98 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Plane Down; INC#0722; 12:29PM; Eb 210 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3B9e1Sv; Sylmar; A fixed wing aircraft (type/size unknown at this time) is down on the freeway embankment. It is unknown at this time if there are any patients/trapped victims. Firefighters are working to access the location. ; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E18 E275 E298 E75 E87 E98 EM15 FR91 HR3 RA75 RA98 T75 T98 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1370; 07:23PM; 604 N Av 54; MAP: https://bit.ly/38WCvF7; #HighlandPark; 41 LAFD Firefighters took just 50 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish stubborn fire that extended from a portion of the first floor, through the walls, to heavily involve the attic of the 1,654 square-foot *2 story* home with cedar siding, built in 1906; The home's detached garage sustained some fire damage. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 12; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC2 E1 E12 E201 E212 E250 E44 E55 RA12 RA844 T1 T12 T50; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey
